author: EXM7777
text:
after testing like 30 different AI writing setups, i keep coming back to this: Kimi K2 in Typingmind

projects for organization, knowledge bases for memory, custom agents for personality... everything just clicks

the output quality is consistently better than anything else i've used - which surprised me, tbh

i thought i'd need multiple models for different tasks, but this one setup handles 90% of my writing

and yeah, when Gemini 3.0 drops i'll test that too, but i have a feeling Kimi K2 is gonna be the one to beat

it's that good already
